original_text:
The Lord God has sworn by his holiness
    that, behold, the days are coming upon you,
when they shall take you away with hooks,
    even the last of you with fishhooks.
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 자기의 거룩함을 두고 맹세하시되 때가 너희에게 이를지라 사람이 갈고리로 너희를 끌어 가며 낚시로 너희의 남은 자들도 그리하리라

sentences.original_text: The Lord God has sworn by his holiness
that, behold, the days are coming upon you
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 그 날들이 너희에게 임할 것이라

sentences.original_text: when they shall take you away with hooks
even the last of you with fishhooks
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 마지막 사람도 낚싯바늘로 끌어가리라
